description.example: The Modest Explorer is a van designed to get you out of the house and into nature. This beauty is equipped with solar panels, a composting toilet, a water tank and kitchenette. The idea is that you can pack up your home and escape for a weekend or even longer!

data.name: Modest Explorer

example.message: "name" is not allowed to be empty

data.name: Reliable Green
data.description: Reliable Green is a van that was made for travelling. The inside is comfortable and cozy, with plenty of space to stretch out in. There's a small kitchen, so you can cook if you need to. You'll feel like home as soon as you step out of it.

data.text: The beach bum is such an awesome van! Such a comfortable trip. We had it for 2 weeks and there was not a single issue. Super clean when we picked it up and the host is very comfortable and understanding. Highly recommend!
